name: Antoree
description:
We are the English Online Tutoring Marketplace for Developers and Professionals in Southeast Asia. We offer learners the best English solutions through a variety of tutor selection, personalized courses, comprehensive test system and reliable certificates. Antoree is a supportive community of learners and teachers, helping each other with English education. The classes are conducted online, via Skype, and are strictly 1-on-1: One learner, one teacher.
"You're average of the 5 people you're closest with"?.
1. We're a bunch of passionate, talented, hard-working, ambitious young enthusiasts.
2. We have fun everyday working and playing at our Antoree nests in Saigon, Hanoi, Nha Trang.
3. We love challenges and adventures.
4. We choose to spend the most beautiful years of our youth living a life of purpose and meaning, to help connect students and teachers all over the world for better learning and teaching.
5. We dream big and we work on making our dreams come true.
6. We're committed to creating a better future for our customers, ourselves and our community.
7. However, we're not for everyone. We're not for the lazy, the meaningless, the frivolous, the mediocre, the weak-willed.
And we believe you're gonna have the best time of your life, with the best co-workers of your five :-)
